يترقب الشارع الكروي مواجهة قوية بين النادي الأهلي ونظيره نادي زد مساء اليوم على أرضية ستاد القاهرة الدولي ضمن الجولة العشرين للدوري المصري الممتاز، في مباراة تتنوع فيها الطموحات بين فريق يسعى للوصول إلى القمة وآخر…

external.description: يترقب الشارع الكروي مواجهة قوية بين النادي الأهلي ونظيره نادي زد مساء اليوم على أرضية ستاد القاهرة الدولي ضمن الجولة العشرين للدوري المصري الممتاز، في مباراة تتنوع فيها الطموحات بين فريق يسعى للوصول إلى القمة وآخر يسعى لاستعادة مكانته بين الكبار. ويدخل الأهلي المباراة في المركز الثالث برصيد 36 نقطة بعد أن حقق 10 انتصارات و6 تعادلات مقابل خسارة واحدة، ليظل على بعد نقطة واحدة من الصدارة.

تشكيل الأهلي المتوقع أمام زد في الدوري المصري

استقر الدنماركي جيس توروب، المدير الفني للفريق الأول لكرة القدم بالنادي الأهلي، على التشكيل المتوقع الذي سيلعب به ضد زيد، في الجولة العشرين من مسابقة الدوري المصري الممتاز. ويستضيف الأهلي نظيره زد إف سي على ستاد القاهرة الدولي، في مباراة يسعى من خلالها…

external.description: استقر الدنماركي جيس توروب، المدير الفني للفريق الأول لكرة القدم بالنادي الأهلي، على التشكيل المتوقع الذي سيلعب به ضد زيد، في الجولة العشرين من مسابقة الدوري المصري الممتاز. ويستضيف الأهلي نظيره زد إف سي على ستاد القاهرة الدولي، في مباراة يسعى من خلالها العملاق الأحمر إلى مواصلة الضغط على صدارة الترتيب. موقف الاهلي في جدول الدوري ويدخل الأهلي المباراة في المركز الثالث برصيد 36 نقطة جمعها من 17 مباراة، بفارق نقطة واحدة فقط عن الزمالك المتصدر الذي يملك 37 نقطة.

رسالة من روبيو لسفراء واشنطن حول العالم.. هذا ما جاء فيها

أرسل وزير الخارجية الأميركي ماركو روبيو رسائل إلى سفراء بلاده حول العالم، يطالبهم فيها بالامتناع عن الإدلاء بتصريحات قد "تؤجج التوترات الإقليمية"، وذلك بعد أيام من إثارة السفير الأميركي لدى إسرائيل مايك هاكابي، ردود فعل غاضبة في الشرق…

external.description: أرسل وزير الخارجية الأميركي ماركو روبيو رسائل إلى سفراء بلاده حول العالم، يطالبهم فيها بالامتناع عن الإدلاء بتصريحات قد "تؤجج التوترات الإقليمية"، وذلك بعد أيام من إثارة السفير الأميركي لدى إسرائيل مايك هاكابي، ردود فعل غاضبة في الشرق الأوسط وخارجه، لتصريحاته بشأن أحقية إسرائيل "الدينية" في جزء كبير من أراضي المنطقة. وجاء في الرسالة التي حصلت صحيفة "غارديان" البريطانية على نسخة منها: "نظرا لتصاعد التوترات في المنطقة، على رؤساء البعثات والسفارات في مواقعها الامتناع عن التصريحات العامة أو المقابلات أو أي نشاط على منصات التواصل الاجتماعي قد يؤجج التوترات الإقليمية، أو يؤثر سلبا على القضايا السياسية الحساسة، أو يعقد العلاقات الأميركية".
external.title: رسالة من روبيو لسفراء واشنطن حول العالم.. هذا ما جاء فيها

record.text:
ماذا أهدى زعيم كوريا الشمالية كبار المسؤولين العسكريين في البلاد؟

وأتت الهدايا بعد مؤتمر للحزب الحاكم استمر أسبوعا، حيث سلطت وسائل الإعلام الرسمية الضوء على صورة لابنته المراهقة وهي تطلق النار في ميدان الرماية. وأثار الظهور البارز لابنة الزعيم بشكل متزايد، التكهنات بأن كيم يعدها كزعيمة مستقبلية.…

external.description: وأتت الهدايا بعد مؤتمر للحزب الحاكم استمر أسبوعا، حيث سلطت وسائل الإعلام الرسمية الضوء على صورة لابنته المراهقة وهي تطلق النار في ميدان الرماية. وأثار الظهور البارز لابنة الزعيم بشكل متزايد، التكهنات بأن كيم يعدها كزعيمة مستقبلية. وقالت وكالة الأنباء المركزية الكورية الشمالية الرسمية، السبت، إن كيم قدم البنادق لكبار مسؤولي الحزب والجيش، الجمعة، ووصفها بأنها "علامة على ثقته المطلقة وامتنانه لالتزامهم على مدى السنوات الخمس الماضية"، منذ آخر مؤتمر لحزب العمال عام 2021.
external.title: ماذا أهدى زعيم كوريا الشمالية كبار المسؤولين العسكريين في البلاد؟

record.text:
正解が分かっている人が更に深堀をするためにAIを使いこなすのが一番、有益な使い方だと思います！！
そのジャンルの素人だと、正解か不正解かを確認するところに一番労力がかかりますので……（汗）。
食い違ったところ、間違えたところを互いに喰わせてみると、どこからか新たな詳細情報が出てきたりして……なかなか面白いですw。

無難なことしか答えないのは共通してますが、個性はある印象です。……ただ、訓練次第で変化してゆくので使いこなせば印象は変わって行くかと思います。
私は、各々の個性を楽しむというよりも「その情報本当？」って確認をするために複数利用してます。

The consumer AI land grab is over. OpenAI won.

Auf der offiziellen Website der Anime-Umsetzung stellten die Verantwortlichen ein weiteres Mitglied des japanischen Sprechercasts offiziell vor. Zusätzlich wurden die Artists der Theme-Songs bekannt gegeben. Der Opening-Song »Tōmei« wird von Novelbright beigesteuert, während der Ending-Song »Sakasama« von Polkadot Stingray stammt. Der Anime startet am 2. April bei Netflix.

📜 Beschreibung 》
Koyuki Higawa tut sich schwer im Umgang mit anderen und hält deshalb bewusst Abstand. In der Highschool bleibt sie meist allein, bis sie auf Minato Amamiya trifft, der aus unerklärlichen Gründen immer wieder die Nähe zu ihr sucht. Zusammen mit der beliebten Miki und dem gutmütigen Basketballer Youta entfaltet sich die Geschichte von vier etwas komplizierten Jugendlichen und ihrer holprigen, aber faszinierenden Jugendzeit.

📢【Dandelion】bekommt eine Anime-Adaption! ✨️

📅 Starttermin 》April 2026
✨ Genre 》Comedy
🎬 Studio 》NAZ

#だんでらいおん #dandelion #アニメ #Anime #AnimeNews

images.alt:
🎙️ Charaktere & Cast (Japanisch)
»Tetsuo Tanba« von Chikahiro Kobayashi
»Misaki Kurogane« von Megumi Han

Netflix gab mit einem Visual bekannt, dass der One-Shot-Manga »Dandelion« von Hideaki Sorachi eine Anime-Adaption erhält. Der Anime startet im April auf Netflix im Simulcast und wird 7 Episoden erhalten. Zudem stellte man die Mitwirkenden an der Produktion sowie den japanischen Sprechercast offiziell vor.

»Dandelion« erschien erstmals im September 2002 im Weekly Shonen Jump Magazine von Shueisha und Shueisha veröffentlicht den One-Shot anschließend als Teil des ersten Bandes Gintama Mangas.

»Dandelion« entsteht bei NAZ (Hamiketsu) unter der Regie von Daisuke Mataga (Fullmetal Alchemist: The Sacred Star of Milos), die Series Composition übernimmt Yosuke Suzuki (A Gentle Noble's Vacation Recommendation), das Character Design stammt von Ai Asari (Sabikui Bisco), und die Musik komponiert Yuki Hayashi (Haikyu!!).

📜 Beschreibung 》
Im „Send-Off Department“ der Japanese Angel Federation helfen die Engel Tetsuo Tanba und Misaki Kurogane rastlosen Seelen, ihren Frieden zu finden. Statt Fälle einfach nur schnell abzuschließen, nehmen sie sich Zeit für jeden Geist, hören sich dessen Reue an und helfen ihm, loszulassen. So geht das Duo seinen eigenen Weg, auch wenn der Arbeitsalltag sie ständig unter Druck setzt. Eines Tages treffen sie auf den Geist eines alten Mannes, der verzweifelt in voller Geschwindigkeit vor etwas davonzulaufen versucht.

Why The Bitcoin Price May Have Hit Rock Bottom Already At $63,000

Bitcoin's recent price dip caused investors to speculate about the market bottom. Analysts offer varied predictions, some expecting further crashes while others believe the bottom is near. Analyst Plan C argu…
#btc #crypto #cryptoetf

external.description: Bitcoin's recent price dip caused investors to speculate about the market bottom. Analysts offer varied predictions, some expecting further crashes while others believe the bottom is near. Analyst Plan C argues that Bitcoin won't experience the typical 80-90% crash seen in previous bear markets. Instead, Plan C forecasts a 50-60% crash, suggesting a bottom near $50,000 to $63,000.  This implies the bottom might be in, considering Bitcoin previously dropped below $63,000. This deviation from the typical cycle is attributed to institutional entry via Spot Bitcoin ETFs. This new dynamic started when Bitcoin hit a new all-time high in early 2024. Despite this, uncertainty persists due to negative market sentiment. The Fear & Greed Index remains in Extreme Fear, adding to the uncertainty. Ultimately, the future price movement of Bitcoin remains to be seen.
external.title: Why The Bitcoin Price May Have Hit Rock Bottom Already At $63,000

Last time I read Knuth's ordered linear probing hashing was years ago, but I was pretty sure it isn't exactly the same idea as RH (either the sort-by-hash or sort-by-distance variants).

external.description: In a shocking discovery, an illegal biological laboratory was found inside an Airbnb garage in Las Vegas. The lab, run by Israeli citizen Ori Solomon, was raided by the FBI, leading to the seizure of over 1,000 biological samples of unknown substances. These included fridges filled with vials of unidentifiable liquids, centrifuges, and gallon jugs of red and brown materials. First responders and cleaners fell seriously ill after being exposed to the lab's contents, though there has been no public health advisory or declaration of a bioweapon risk. While no immediate threat has been declared, the FBI continues to investigate the samples in their labs. The lab operator, Ori Solomon, was found to possess multiple IDs under different names, as well as Israeli and French passports. Investigators have also linked this incident to a similar bio-lab found in Reedley, CA, which was involved with dangerous biological agents. Despite the potential risks posed by such labs, questions remain about why individuals like Solomon are allowed to own properties and operate such labs under questionable circumstances. The case raises broader concerns about international connections, rogue science, and government oversight in biosecurity matters.

Assisted Dying Bill in England and Wales Expected to Fail Before May Deadline

🤖 IA: It's clickbait ⚠️
👥 Usuarios: It's clickbait ⚠️

View full AI summary:

The controversial Terminally Ill Adults (End of Life) Bill, which seeks to legalise assisted dying in England and Wales, is set to fail due to

external.description: The controversial Terminally Ill Adults (End of Life) Bill, which seeks to legalise assisted dying in England and Wales, is set to fail due to insufficient parliamentary time. With only six sitting days remaining before the parliamentary session concludes in May, the government has confirmed it will not allocate additional time for debate in the House of Lords. Labour chief whip in the Lords, Roy Kennedy, stated that without further debate, the bill cannot progress. Campaigners supporting assisted dying, including broadcaster Dame Esther Rantzen, have criticised a small group of peers for submitting over 1,200 amendments, which they argue are designed to block the bill rather than scrutinise it. Individuals like Frank Sutton, who have terminal illnesses, emphasise the importance of having control over the circumstances of their death. Opponents, including Dr Gordon McDonald of Care Not Killing, defend the Lords' scrutiny, claiming that proper consideration is essential. Although the Welsh Parliament has issued a legislative consent order endorsing the bill, the government is expected to remain cautious, as some cabinet members are firmly opposed. Supporters suggest that if the bill were reintroduced, the process could be expedited using parliamentary mechanisms, but political and procedural hurdles, along with the approach of a general election, make this challenging. The focus now shifts to possible future attempts at reform and public advocacy for assisted dying legislation.
external.title: Read more

external.description: Keir Starmer is facing significant pressure within his own party following a historic defeat in the Gorton and Denton byelection, where Labour lost a 13,000 majority to the Greens. The defeat has intensified calls for Starmer to shift the party's direction, particularly with growing Green support threatening Labour’s traditional base. While the Greens celebrated their first-ever byelection victory, Labour MPs are urging the prime minister to address the drift of left-wing voters. This defeat could catalyse a leadership challenge if Starmer fails to take action before key upcoming elections. Some party figures have voiced concern that the Prime Minister is not responsive to the crisis, accusing him of sticking to outdated strategies. There are increasing fears that Labour may also lose ground in elections for Scottish and Welsh parliaments and local councils in May. In response, Starmer has dismissed suggestions that the Greens are an extreme party and has yet to commit to any radical shifts in policy.

external.description: OpenAI обяви, че броят на седмично активните потребители на ChatGPT е достигнал 900 милиона. Това показва, че най-известният чатбот с изкуствен интелект постоянно се приближава към заветната граница от 1 милиард потребители. Компанията също така обяви, че броят на платените абонати се е увеличил до 50 милиона. "Инерцията на абонатите се ускори значително в началото на годината, като според прогнозите януари и февруари ще бъдат най-силните месеци по отношение на новите абонати в нашата история. Хората използват ChatGPT за учене, писане на съобщения, планиране и творчество. С увеличаването на употребата продуктът се подобрява по начини, които потребителите усещат веднага: по-бързи отговори, по-висока точност, подобрена сигурност и по-стабилна работа."
external.title: Аудиторията на ChatGPT достигна 900 милиона седмични потребители

Споровете между Anthropic и Вашингтон може да са включвали и използването на ядрено оръжие

„Уошингтън поуст“ продължава да разнищва всичко случващо се около битката на Anthropic с Пентагона. Повод за поредния репортаж (от вчера) се явява категоричния отказ на Дарио Амодей, основател на Anthropic,…

external.description: „Уошингтън поуст“ продължава да разнищва всичко случващо се около битката на Anthropic с Пентагона. Повод за поредния репортаж (от вчера) се явява категоричния отказ на Дарио Амодей, основател на Anthropic, да се подчини на натиска на държавата. През миналата година Anthropic и Пентагона сключват споразумение на стойност $200 милиона, за да може последните да използват Claude AI. По-рано тази година, Вашингтон иска от Амодей да отключи пълните възможности на технологията, премахвайки някои протоколи за сигурност, които са вградени в Claude. Anthropic отказват с довода, че не искат технологията да се използва за масово следене или създаването на автономни машини за убиване.

Nvidia обяви 25-годишнината на фамилията графични карти GeForce3, която дебютира на 27 февруари 2001 година. Това бяха първите потребителски видеокарти GeForce, които откриха достъп до програмируеми…

external.description: Nvidia обяви 25-годишнината на фамилията графични карти GeForce3, която дебютира на 27 февруари 2001 година. Това бяха първите потребителски видеокарти GeForce, които откриха достъп до програмируеми шейдъри. Производителят също така припомни ерата на компютърните игри по времето на пускането на GeForce3: споменати са заглавия като Max Payne и Warcraft III - две игри, които помогнаха да се определи преходът към усъвършенствани 3D енджини и ефекти на компютрите с Windows. Nvidia GeForce3 са малка фамилия по сегашните стандарти. Линията се разширява през 2001 година, като на дребно се продават три основни варианта: оригиналниата Nvidia GeForce3, GeForce3 Ti 200 с препоръчителна цена на дребно 149 долара и GeForce3 Ti 500 за 349 долара.

Word count tools are everywhere.

But most don't count tokens.

GPT-5.2 charges by tokens, not words. 1 word ≠ 1 token.

Example: "ChatGPT" = 2 tokens, "AI" = 1 token.

Know your costs before you prompt.

Reality check: Your brand colours matter more than your AI strategy.

Consistent visual identity = trust
Trust = sales
Sales = business growth

Get the basics right first.

(Yes, there are free AI tools for colour palettes too)

Claude Sonnet 4.6 vs GPT-5.2 for customer service automation:

Claude: Better at nuanced responses, fewer hallucinations
GPT: Faster processing, better integration options

Both crush simple FAQ automation.

Choose based on complexity, not hype.

He was at the heart of 1960s counterculture, then paved the way for the libertarian mindset of Silicon Valley. At 87, Brand is still keen to ensure the world is maintained properly – not just today, but for the next 10,000 yearsStewart Brand thinks big and long. He thinks on a planetary scal...

external.description: He was at the heart of 1960s counterculture, then paved the way for the libertarian mindset of Silicon Valley. At 87, Brand is still keen to ensure the world is maintained properly – not just today, but for the next 10,000 yearsStewart Brand thinks big and long. He thinks on a planetary scale – as suggested by the title of his celebrated Whole Earth Catalog – and on the longest of timeframes, as with his Long Now Foundation, which looks forward to the next 10,000 years of human civilisation. He has had a lifelong fascination with the future, and anything that could get us there faster, from space travel to psychedelic drugs to computing. In fact, he was arguably the bridge between the San Francisco counterculture of the 60s and present-day Silicon Valley: in his commencement speech at Stanford University in 2005, Steve Jobs eulogised the Whole Earth Catalog and Brand’s philosophy, and echoed its farewell mantra: “Stay hungry. Stay foolish.”You could say that Brand has also lived big and long. He is now 87 years old, in the final chapters of an eventful and adventurous life that has crossed paths with some of the most consequential events and figures of his era. He has been a writer, an editor, a publisher, a soldier, a photojournalist, an LSD evangelist, an events organiser, a future-planning consultant, even a government adviser (to the California governor Jerry Brown in the late 70s). “There was a time when people asked me, ‘What do you do?’ I said, ‘I find things and I found things,’” says Brand, as in he is a founder. He is speaking from a library where he likes to work in Petaluma, California, not far from his houseboat in Sausalito. “I’m always searching for good stuff to recommend, and good people.” Continue reading...
external.title: Tech legend Stewart Brand on Musk, Bezos and his extraordinary life: ‘We don’t need to passively accept our fate’

external.description: From magical swimming spots to museums and pizza joints, our readers share their top Welsh discoveries• Tell us about a favourite break on an island in Europe – the best tip wins a £200 holiday voucherI’m a fan of the lesser-known beaches along the dramatic and rugged Glamorgan Heritage coastline; Wick, Monknash and Nash Point. One of my favourite routes requires a scenic hike across fields and a precipitous scramble down Cwm Bach ladder. The reward is a gorgeous expanse of rocky beach with only the occasional distant naturist and huge stepped cliffs absolutely full of fossils, including some enormous ammonites. The nearby ancient Plough & Harrow feels like a step back in time and you’re being served beer in someone’s living room.P Thomas Continue reading...

images.alt:
Sam Altman tweet:

Tonight, we reached an agreement with the Department of War to deploy our models in their classified network.

In all of our interactions, the DoW displayed a deep respect for safety and a desire to partner to achieve the best possible outcome.

AI safety and wide distribution of benefits are the core of our mission. Two of our most important safety principles are prohibitions on domestic mass surveillance and human responsibility for the use of force, including for autonomous weapon systems.  The DoW agrees with these principles, reflects them in law and policy, and we put them into our agreement.

We also will build technical safeguards to ensure our models behave as they should, which the DoW also wanted. We will deploy FDEs to help with our models and to ensure their safety, we will deploy on cloud networks only.

We are asking the DoW to offer these same terms to all AI companies, which in our opinion we think everyone should be willing to accept. We have expressed our strong desire to see things de-escalate away from legal and governmental actions and towards reasonable agreements.

We remain committed to serve all of humanity as best we can. The world is a complicated, messy, and sometimes dangerous place.

images.alt:
⭕️ LEAKED Email: Kat Abughazeleh “firmly an interventionist,” foreign policy adviser says

Kat Abughazaleh, a socialist Democratic candidate in Illinois’ 9th District and one of the only Palestinian-Americans seeking office in 2026, was described by her national security adviser as “firmly an interventionist” who “won’t stop until Russia is made to pay for its crimes,” in written responses detailing her foreign policy vision, obtained by Drop Site.

Ben Mermel wrote in an email to a Washington-based progressive foreign policy activist that Abughazaleh believes “the world is better off when America takes a leading role” and that the U.S. has “an obligation to support pro-democracy movements around the world, from Iran to Venezuela.” He added that “Kat wholly supports the National Endowment for Democracy, as well as its affiliated organizations (NDI, IRI, and the AFL-CIO’s Solidarity Center),” and said Congress should expand tools “from sanctions to NGO support” to advance those efforts without always resorting to “kinetic force.”

The DC-based activist had written to Mermel saying he had noticed unusually hawkish language on the campaign website related to Ukraine and Taiwan and was looking for clarification.

In his response, Mermel said that on Taiwan she would amend the Taiwan Relations Act by “dropping our strategic ambiguity” and make clear the U.S. would counter Chinese aggression “with force,” arguing the region now requires “a firmer hand.”

On Ukraine, Mermel wrote she would “hold the line,” support “funding the Ukrainian war effort to the hilt,” back long-range strikes on Russian strategic targets, deploy additional U.S. “air, naval, and ground assets” to NATO’s front line, and that “She supports the seizure and redistribution of Russian assets in Europe and the United States, for the purpose of financing the war effort.”

Abughazaleh did not respond to a request for comment, but a source close to the campaign told Drop Site that the adviser’s email did not accurately represent her views, saying, “Kat is committed to taking on authoritarianism but is vehemently against the military industrial complex and the continuation of failed US intervention approaches.” Abughazaleh has consistently argued against U.S. support for Israel’s genocide in Gaza and, at a recent forum, said she opposes U.S. strikes on Iran.

Mermel in 2024 attended a pro-Israel protest held to counter the encampment at George Washington University. He has been Abughazaleh’s National Security Adviser since July 2025, according to Legistorm. The full exchange is posted below. Watch the report on Breaking Points:

Mermel in 2024 attended a pro-Israel protest held to counter the encampment at George Washington University. He has been Abughazaleh’s National Security Adviser since July 2025, according to Legistorm. The full exchange is posted below. Watch the report on Breaking Points:

external.description:
このポストの概要と補足解説

元の引用ポスト（@Sekinen55さん）
「そもそも高校で行われているのが『高等』教育じゃないんよな（正しくは後期中等教育）」

意味  
高校（高等学校）でやっている教育は、「高等教育」ではなく「後期中等教育」が正しい呼び方だよ、という指摘です。

高等教育（higher education / tertiary education）  
  → 大学・短期大学・専門学校など、中等教育を終えた後の教育（IS CEDレベル5以上）。  
  日本では「高等教育機関」と呼ばれ、大学入試や学士号などが該当。

後期中等教育（upper secondary education）  
  → 中等教育の後半部分、高校3年間に相当（IS CEDレベル3-4）。  
  国際基準（UNESCOなど）では「Upper secondary」と明確に区別されています。

つまり「高校＝高等学校」という学校名と「高等教育」という教育段階を混同しやすいので、「高校の教育は高等教育じゃないよ」と正しているわけです。

返信ポスト（あなたが見たポスト @Wladislao_Ghcbさん）
「学校の形態にある中等教育学校は中学校+高等学校を足したものだし、義務教育学校は小学校+中学校を足したものだからね。」

補足説明  
日本の学校制度には、「一貫校」的な形態が法律で認められています。

| 学校の種類         | 構成内容                     | 期間     | 義務教育部分          | 備考 |
|--------------------|------------------------------|----------|-----------------------|------|
| 義務教育学校   | 小学校＋中学校               | 9年間   | 全期間が義務教育     | 2016年制度創設。一貫したカリキュラムで中1ギャップを解消 |
| 中等教育学校   | 中学校＋高等学校             | 6年間   | 前期3年が義務教育     | 1999年制度創設。「中等教育一貫校」とも呼ばれる |
| 標準型             | 小→中→高（別々の学校）       | 6+3+3   | 小6＋中3             | 最も一般的 |

中等教育学校の例：  
  愛知県立豊橋東高等学校中等教育学校、千葉県立幕張総合高等学校など。  
  内部進学率がほぼ100%で、高校入試を受けずに6年間一貫教育を受けられる。

義務教育学校の例：  
  東京都品川区立日野学園など。9年間同じ校舎・同じ教職員で一貫指導。

これらの学校形態があるからこそ、「中学校＋高等学校＝中等教育学校」「小学校＋中学校＝義務教育学校」という足し算的な説明が自然に出てくるわけです。

さらに深い補足（よくある誤解）
「高等学校」という名前は明治時代にできたもので、当時は「高等」＝「普通教育の最上段階」という意味でした。
しかし戦後・現代の国際基準では「高等教育」は大学以降と明確に分離されたため、名称と実態がズレている状態です。
文部科学省も公式には「高等学校教育は後期中等教育」と記述しています（学校基本調査など）。

つまりこのやり取りは、「学校名」と「教育段階」の違いを丁寧に解説している、教育マニア同士のちょっとした「用語の正しさ」議論ですね！

もし「中等教育学校の実際のカリキュラム例が知りたい」「義務教育学校との違いをもっと詳しく」など、さらに深掘りしたい部分があれば教えてください！

external.description:
この投稿の概要  
https://x.com/i/status/2027611239342653508 は、歴史動画クリエイターの@Yukkuri_mondさんの人気投稿（引用元）に対する引用リプライです。

引用元投稿（投稿から約16時間前、いいね6,400超）：  
世界史を嗜むと、Twitterで流れてくる  
「日本人特有の考え方」  
「日本人は特別」  
みたいなのの99%に反例を提示できるようになります

これに対して本投稿（@Wladislao_Ghcbさん、地理・歴史・公民が専門分野の人）：  
世界史も日本史も学ぶと宗教とか商業とか政治とかの本質は古今東西変わらないのと、更に地理も学ぶとそれらの繋がりがわかるようになる。

つまり「世界史だけで十分」というより、日本史もちゃんとやれば「普遍性」がより実感できるし、地理まで加えると「なぜそうなるのか」の因果関係まで見えてくるという、ワンランク上の補足です。

投稿が言いたいことの解説
人間社会の本質は普遍的  
  権力の仕組み、富の蓄積・分配、信仰の形、共同体と個人の関係…これらは時代・地域を超えて驚くほど似ています。  
  「日本だけ特別」という主張のほとんどは、自分の知っている範囲が狭いだけで、世界史・日本史を横断して見ると「どこかで見たことあるパターン」になります。

地理が「なぜ」を説明する  
  気候・地形・資源・位置が、宗教・商業・政治の形を強く制約します。  
  例：稲作中心の湿潤モンスーン地帯（日本・中国・朝鮮・東南アジア）では水利協力が必要 → 集団主義的傾向が強くなりやすい。  
  一方、乾燥地帯の遊牧民や海洋交易中心の都市国家は、個人の機動力や契約重視になりやすい。

具体的な「日本人特有」主張への反例（世界史・日本史横断）
よくTwitterで見る例と、即座に出せる反例：

| 「日本人特有」と言われがちな主張 | 世界史・日本史の反例 |
|----------------------------------|---------------------|
| 集団主義・和を重視する | 中国儒教社会、欧州中世ギルド、オスマン帝国のミッレト制度、アフリカ部族共同体 |
| 島国だから独自の文化が育った | イギリス（島国で海洋帝国＋立憲君主制）、日本海を挟んだ対馬・隠岐の交易文化 |
| 恥の文化（罪の文化と違う） | 古代ギリシャ・ローマも名誉・恥重視、イスラム文化の「名誉の殺人」概念 |
| 武士道のような忠義精神 | 欧州封建騎士道、モンゴル帝国の「ノケル（忠誠）」、中国の「忠臣」 |
| 稲作社会特有の協調性 | メソポタミア・エジプトの灌漑農業、中国・ベトナムの稲作社会 |
| 商人（町人）文化の独自性 | イタリア・メディチ家、漢代の「塩鉄論」での商工業者、江戸日本とほぼ同時期のオランダ東インド会社 |

これらは「似ている」だけで完全に同じではないですが、「日本人だけ特別」という絶対的な独自性は崩れます。

補足：なぜこの話題が今も繰り返されるのか
Twitterは感情的な短文が拡散されやすい → 「日本すごい」「日本だけおかしい」が極端に強調される。
歴史を「自国中心」でしか学んでいない人が多い（特に世界史を避けた人）。
逆に世界史だけやって「日本史は知らない」人も、同じく偏った見方をする。

著者（@Wladislao_Ghcbさん）が「世界史＋日本史＋地理」の三つセットを推すのは、まさにこの偏りを防ぐための実践的なアドバイスです。  
実際、歴史学者や地理学者は「歴史は地理の産物」「人間の本質は普遍的」とよく言います。

この投稿は、単なる「自慢」や「ディス」ではなく、「もっと広く深く学べば視野が広がるよ」という、とても建設的な一言ですね。  
歴史・地理好きの人なら、思わず「まさにそれ！」と頷いてしまう内容です。
